page.title: 12THE FAMILY ON SUNDAY
page.content: On Sunday I get up at 7 a.m. & come downstairs. Nearly an hour later, my brother comes down. I then went to get dressed & went outside to build a jump for my BMX bike. When I went indoors, my brother was still watching TV. After breakfast I went outside & took the jump to pieces & built a new one. At half past twelve, my Dad said,"Why don't we go out for the day?" So we went out to lunch to the Albert in Colchester and then on to the Zoo. There were lots of animals there like lions, snakes & fish of all shapes & sizes. The one I liked best was the ape. Afterwards we went to my Aunt Chrissy's & Uncle Tommy's house. My brother & I played with their dog Tina. By that time it was getting late, so we came home & my brother & I went to bed.
